verses.name: 1 Kings 15:13
verses.text: And also Maachah his mother, even her he removed from being queen, because she had made an idol in a grove; and Asa destroyed her idol, and burnt it by the brook Kidron.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:14
verses.text: But the high places were not removed: nevertheless Asa’s heart was perfect with the Lord all his days.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:15
verses.text: And he brought in the things which his father had dedicated, and the things which himself had dedicated, into the house of the Lord, silver, and gold, and vessels.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:16
verses.text: And there was war between Asa and Baasha king of Israel all their days.
